item.description:
LINE DANCING AND WALKIN WITH SARAH TEAGLE AND ME ME

Line Dancing 8 to 9 p.m.

"Walkin" 9 to 10 p.m.

You don't have to know how to Step to participate
Wear comfortable shoes

The workshop fee of $30, includes admission to the 10 PM set

Open to all who want to learn some of the latest moves

Walkin
http://www.youtube.co...

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2nd ANNUAL JEANS & BLING STEPPERS SET AT 10pm

The Set will begin immediately following the Walkin and Line Dance Workshop at 10 PM

This is the perfect atmosphere, and the perfect party.

Bring friends, tell everyone, the more the merrier.


Attire: Dress to impress JEANS AND BLING

Cover: $10 (for set only)

Grille 831 Executive Chef Team will provide light buffet

Music: DJ C-Smooth and DJ Bright Eyes
Great sound system, excellent, friction-free dance floor
Step to the sounds of R & B, Soul, Neo-Soul, Smooth Jazz, Hip-Hop, and the Classics!

Ample free parking

See You There or B-Square!!!


The fee for this workshop is $30 per person


** 2 for 1 special at $50 = Any 1 workshop and Friday Line Dance/Walking class (The Sunday class has Sold Out).


See Lady Val to make your cash or check purchase to reserve your place in the workshops and classes. Or purchase this workshop via PayPal using your credit card. Or mail a check (payable to Steppers of Boston) to
Steppers of Boston
42 Wheeler Circle #41
Stoughton, MA 02072


Parking Validation 2 hours Free

Pay Pal accepted. Please note: There will be a $2 surcharge added for credit card transactions

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: Max's Blues Cafe Line Dance/ Walkin Class 8:00 pm
